title: Chesapeake Bay: Professional Development
body: Professional Development CHBA        Teacher Workshops Join fellow educators in exploring the history and issues surrounding the natural and cultural environment of the Chesapeake Bay region.  There are opportunities to learn about countless topics and stories along the Star-Spangled Banner National Historic Trail and the Captain John Smith National Historic Trail. All Teacher Workshops     Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Step out of the classroom and on to a National Historic Trail near you this summer!  Be a part of the nationwide Teacher-Ranger-Teacher program working with the NPS in the Chesapeake Bay to develop resources related to the Star-Spangled Banner National Historic Trail and the Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail. All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers
